summary: Allows Vampires to drink blood from corpses.
descriptionHtml:
Allows Vampires to drink blood from corpses. 

To clarify: This is not my work. All Credits to Valini. I edited her Modification to allow Vanilla-Vampires feeding on corpses, which is a feature of this Mod: 

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4407

Move the .esp file into your /data folder and activate it via launcher.
author: Keycid
